posts.post_content:
Great eye appeal for a "1" as you can see. As you might suspect given how nice the front is, there is some back damage. I'd be happy to provide a scan to any interested parties. Price is $500 shipped, payable by check or PP gift. Yes, this is above VCP, but this is much nicer than your average 1 in my opinion. PM if interested. Thanks.

[IMG]http://caimages.collectors.com/psaimages/3578/24440862/1895n300mdahlen1.jpg[/IMG]
